dialogue.content: I'm worried about my husband getting lost when he goes for his short walks.
Is he becoming more disoriented lately?
Just occasionally, especially if he takes a new turn in the neighborhood.
Would you like him to wear a GPS watch that lets you see his location on your phone?
I'm fine with using a tracking app, as long as it's easy for me to read the map.
I'll help you set up a 'safe zone' alert so you'll know if he goes too far.
That would be such a relief; I'd finally stop pacing the floor whenever he's out.
